parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240017) at the end, which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions Ion Samoilă, identifying him as a candidate for the position of deputy in the Romanian Parliament for the PSD party.  The image further reinforces this by displaying his picture and the PSD logo. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting parameters (age, location) further confirm this intention.  The message is not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The phrases "Votează Calea Sigură pentru Călărași" ("Vote the Safe Path for Călărași") and "Am credința că voi contribui la aducerea județului Călărași pe calea sigură a schimbării în bine!" ("I believe that I will contribute to bringing Călărași County on the safe path of positive change!") directly encourage voters to support Ion Samoilă. The overall objective is clearly to influence the vote in his favor. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content. It's a promotional piece advocating for a specific candidate, not an unbiased report or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. While the post presents some of the candidate's views, it's primarily focused on promoting his candidacy and urging voters to support him, not expressing a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>460612109841865</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 460612109841865, fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and is likely in violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post explicitly promotes Ion Samoilă, a PSD candidate, using persuasive language and imagery. The presence of a CMF number confirms its official nature as electoral material. The paid nature of the post and its targeting parameters indicate an intention to reach a wide audience and influence voting behavior.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  There is no doubt that the objective is to increase votes for the candidate.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Ion Samoilă</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
ROGER GRAPHIC DESIGN SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 460612109841865) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui Ion Samoilă pentru PSD, folosind fraze persuasive precum "Votează Calea Sigură pentru Călărași" și imagini care îl prezintă pe candidat, având ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru acesta. Prezența numărului CMF 11240017 confirmă natura electorală a materialului.  Postarea, fiind plătită și direcționată către un public specific, demonstrează intenția clară de a influența votul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
